DummyStructure.Affiliation: Empire, Rebel, Underworld, EmpireoftheHand, Pentastar, Greater_Maldrood, Zsinj_Empire, Hapes_Consortium, Eriadu_Authority, Corporate_Sector, SsiRuuvi_Imperium

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Cruel_Off
DummyStructure.Affiliation: Empire, Rebel, Underworld, EmpireoftheHand, Pentastar, Greater_Maldrood, Zsinj_Empire, Hapes_Consortium, Eriadu_Authority, Corporate_Sector, SsiRuuvi_Imperium

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Respawn_On
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Allow your Heroes to respawn. The Respawn time is unique for each hero and depends on their estimated strength. Each death increases the respawn time by 10% for that hero. - [Can be deactivated]
DummyStructure.Affiliation: Empire, Rebel, Underworld, EmpireoftheHand, Pentastar, Greater_Maldrood, Zsinj_Empire, Hapes_Consortium, Eriadu_Authority, Corporate_Sector, SsiRuuvi_Imperium

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Respawn_Off
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Prevent your heroes from respawning，even those that are currently under a respawn timer. No new timers will be set. If an old timer expires，they are gone forever. - [Can be reactivated]
DummyStructure.Affiliation: Empire, Rebel, Underworld, EmpireoftheHand, Pentastar, Greater_Maldrood, Zsinj_Empire, Hapes_Consortium, Eriadu_Authority, Corporate_Sector, SsiRuuvi_Imperium

DummyStructure.Name: Option_AI_Respawn_On
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Allow enemy AI Heroes to respawn globally. The Respawn time is unique for each hero and depends on their estimated strength. Each death increases the respawn time by 10% for that hero. - [Can be deactivated]
DummyStructure.Affiliation: Empire, Rebel, Underworld, EmpireoftheHand, Pentastar, Greater_Maldrood, Zsinj_Empire, Hapes_Consortium, Eriadu_Authority, Corporate_Sector, SsiRuuvi_Imperium

DummyStructure.Name: Option_AI_Respawn_Off
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Prevent enemy AI heroes from respawning，even those that are currently under a respawn timer. No new timers will be set. If an old timer expires，they are gone forever. - [Can be reactivated]
DummyStructure.Affiliation: Empire, Rebel, Underworld, EmpireoftheHand, Pentastar, Greater_Maldrood, Zsinj_Empire, Hapes_Consortium, Eriadu_Authority, Corporate_Sector, SsiRuuvi_Imperium

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Increase_Rep_Staff
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Increase the total number of New Republic admirals that can be active at the same time by one.

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Regime_No_Despawn
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Prevent regime specific heroes from leaving when transitioning to the next Imperial regime.
DummyStructure.Affiliation: Empire, Rebel, Underworld, EmpireoftheHand, Pentastar, Greater_Maldrood, Zsinj_Empire, Hapes_Consortium, Eriadu_Authority, Corporate_Sector, SsiRuuvi_Imperium

DummyStructure.Name: Option_Regime_Yes_Despawn
DummyStructure.Encyclopedia_Text: Allow the current regime specific heroes to despawn when transitioning to the next Imperial regime.
DummyStructure.Affiliation: Empire, Rebel, Underworld, EmpireoftheHand, Pentastar, Greater_Maldrood, Zsinj_Empire, Hapes_Consortium, Eriadu_Authority, Corporate_Sector, SsiRuuvi_Imperium
